article_title: The Definitive Questions And Answers On The New Net Investment Income Tax

article_metadata.description: A Q&A on one of Obamacare's provisions, the new 3.8% tax on net investment income that is applied to individual taxpayers beginning January 1, 2013.
article_metadata.author: Tony Nitti
